column1: Rachel & I sound off on Nancy Pelosi breaking the rules to get her hair done & whether school COVID rules are about keeping kids safe or keeping schools from being sued. Watch a short clip below or go to FB for full conversation https://t.co/8rRsEGm5OF https://t.co/sTympo8JUg
Media “so concerned” about COVID spreading at mostly-white Trump rally in Oklahoma but not concerned about it spreading at mostly-black BLM protests. So media doesn’t care about black lives?
